name: Pet Walker
description:
WASD - Move
SpaceBar - Jump
LeftShift - Sprint

Go around town gathering pets to walk for more money income.
The more pets you are walking the more money you make.
You only have about three minutes to make money.
The higher and quicker you make money is better, try to create a "strategy path" to make the most money!

For the Lost-Relics GameJam

Assets Used:
Characters and Pets models-
Quaternious
https://quaternius.com/

Town Models-
Snaps Prototype Sci-fi Urban
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/snaps-prototype-sci...

Music-
Song: Lollipop-
SnipprSnappr

I started losing my ambition to make this like halfway through, I was planning on having it be more story based where the player is needy and starts breaking into homes and steals pets to bank them at their own home. With a whole cop chase sequence. I wanted to add more platforming elements in to coincide with the pet-napping idea, like jumping through windows and stuff on the 3rd floor of buildings.
But I got better projects to work on, this project just didn't interest me anymore after a few days.
